root: ^Hey Isaac, I'm back with the yellow flowers.
^But, are only yellow flowers in a boquet enough?
^We're gonna need a variety of flowers in order to get your feelings across to the special someone.
^O-oh, I see. I guess there's a lot more to flower picking than I thought.
^I don't know enough about flowers, let alone boquets.
^Don't worry, that's why I'm here to help. I still need some time to explore the areas around the village. So I'll be back tomorrow and let you know what we're gathering next.
^That's nice to hear. Thank you for helping me with this. See you tomorrow.
